oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate T. A. Daniel's oath of surrender
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pvt. Daniel, Co. K, 3rd Consolidated Regt. Tenn. Inf.""has given his solemn obligation not to take up arms against the Government of the United States" following the surrender of Gen. joseph E. Johnston's Army of Tennessee to Gen. William T. Sherman's Federal Army in North Carolina. Signed by Col. James D. Tillman CSA, Commanding. Daniel was wounded at Shiloh. Before regiment consolidation, he was a soldier in Co. G, 24th Tenn. Inf. Regt.
